title: Quite a climb but impressive views
text: It is currently under restoration but still great! Sun is very very hot so do drink more water and wear sun screen.

title: Impressive views but too hot
text: Impressive views of Athens can be seen here. The pantheon was impressive but it was too hot. There is no shelter built and lots of stairs to climb. Do be careful as some of the rocks and marble slabs are very slippery. No food and drinks allow except water.

title: Great pizza at good value!
text: yellow cab has a good variety of pizzas in 3 sizes. i love the small size (10 inch), you can order multiple flavours to share with your friends.

title: great ambience!
text: Wild honey has a wide variety of all day breakfast, we had 4 different types of all day breakfast and it was great!

title: great atmosphere
text: Supply & Demand has a great atmosphere. There is a rooftop bar above with great views. There is a live band too.
